title: Tashkent Hotel
meta_description: Discover the perfect blend of luxury and comfort at our boutique hotel in Nukus. Immerse yourself in breathtaking mountain views, unwind in our spa, and indulge in exquisite cuisine at our on-site restaurant. Whether you're here for business or pleasure, our pet-friendly accommodations and attentive service ensure a memorable stay. Book your stay today and experience the finest hospitality Nukus has to offer.
meta_keywords: Tashkent, Tashkent Hotel,Nukus,Accommodation,Luxury hotel,Boutique hotel,Budget hotel,Business hotel,Resort,Family-friendly hotel,Pet-friendly hotel,Beachfront hotel,Mountain view hotel,City center hotel,Conference facilities,Restaurant,Bar,Swimming pool,Gym/fitness center
hotel_address: Nukus, avenue Uzbekistan Guzary №73. LLC “HOTEL TASHKENT”
home_slider_title_2: The most comfortable rooms in Nukus
home_slider_desc: Welcome to our cozy hotel! We offer you comfortable rooms where you can have a pleasant and pleasant stay.
room_slider_title: First impression are important, but last impression we leave with customer we leave the most lasting impression.
room_desc: Experience unparalleled comfort in our luxurious rooms
room_1_desc: Experience the comfort of a home away from home in our spacious and fully equipped apartments.
room_2_desc: Indulge in the ultimate luxury with our Luxe rooms, offering exquisite amenities and lavish comforts.
room_3_desc: Enjoy a cozy and private retreat in our well-appointed single rooms, perfect for solo travelers.
room_4_desc: Unwind in our stylish double rooms, designed to provide a comfortable and inviting space for two guests.
room_5_desc: Accommodate your group or family comfortably in our triple rooms, featuring ample space and thoughtful amenities for a memorable stay.
single_room_desc: Hotel offers – 8 Standard Single rooms Queen Size bed (1.60 x 2m), and also upper floors accessible by elevator, linen, wardrobe or closet, hand sanitizer, tea-coffee maker minibar, air conditioning, safety deposit box, soundproofing, iron and ironing facilities, heating, carpeted, laptop safe, electric kettle, tumble dryer, desk, seating area,Smart TV, telephone, satellite channels, cable channels, air purifiers installed, socket near the bed, clothes rack and also wake up call service.
about_us_title: Most Safe & Rated Hotel In Nukus.
about_us_desc_1: Our hotel offers a relaxing atmosphere and many amenities for a comfortable stay. We offer a variety of accommodation options that are suitable for a group of friends or families with children. Rooms with a double bed and an extra sofa bed can easily accommodate a group of friends or a family with children.
about_us_desc_2: Our rooms are equipped with everything you need for your stay, including air conditioning, TVs and free Wi-Fi. We guarantee that in our hotel you will find everything you need for a great holiday and we will try to make your stay with us as comfortable and enjoyable as possible.
about_slider_title: All of our accommodation options comprise luxury amenities such as tea & coffee makers, minibars
about_feature_title: Sunny and warm Nukus is the capital of Karakalpakstan
about_feature_desc: Nukus, a captivating city nestled in the heart of Uzbekistan, offers a captivating blend of rich cultural heritage, stunning natural landscapes, and warm hospitality, making it a hidden gem waiting to be discovered.
about_feature_1_desc: Our furniture brought from abroad to order. A carefully selected palette of color and style will always be recognizable among our guests
about_feature_2_desc: Delicious and healthy food is always to everyone's liking, especially when food reduces fatigue and stress during travel. And we know about this!
about_feature_3_desc: Our motto is to be the best in our field. And the most important thing is to always keep a high level of service.
contact_slider_title: Great choice for a relaxing vacation for families with children or a group of friends

explore_desc: Immerse yourself in a serene ambiance and enjoy a wide range of amenities that ensure a tranquil and enjoyable stay at our hotel.
explore_feature_1_desc: Step into a world of unmatched comfort and sophistication with our Quality Room. Designed with meticulous attention to detail, this room offers a haven of tranquility and relaxation. Immerse yourself in the luxurious surroundings, from the tasteful decor to the plush furnishings
explore_feature_2_desc: Uncompromising excellence awaits you in our Best Accommodation. Discover a world of luxury and indulgence, where every detail has been carefully curated to create an unparalleled experience
explore_feature_3_desc: Indulge your taste buds and elevate your dining experience at our exceptional Restaurants & Bars. Immerse yourself in a culinary journey that showcases a fusion of flavors, exquisite presentations, and impeccable service
explore_feature_4_desc: Take advantage of our enticing Special Offers and elevate your stay to new heights. Designed to provide exceptional value and enhance your experience, our exclusive offers cater to various preferences and occasions
testimonial_desc: Don't just take our word for it, hear what our guests have to say about their stay at our hotel
testimonial_testi_1_desc: “Incredible welcoming a d helpful staff. We were picked up from the train station and on the way back they were even so flexible to organize a pickup from the museum to the train station bringing all our luggage with them, all for free.  Absolutely fantastic customer service!!”
testimonial_testi_2_desc: “modern and clean, perhaps the biggest in Nukus, well trained staff, airport pick-up was practical. the reception staff, speaking good English, made massive efforts to find a shared taxi for me to go from Nukus to Khiva at reasonable price, while i had no idea where to ask or how much it would cost. appreciate reception staff's assistance, they are the best! very big room, good breakfast.”
testimonial_testi_3_desc: “Great hotel - wonderful room, helpful and pleasant staff at reception, excellent cleaning staff who worked really hard to keep the place neat and tidy.  There isn't a great deal to in Nukus, but Tashkent Hotel is in a great position.  The free airport transfer is handy.”
tour_title: Savoring the City's Beauty: A Moment of Visual Bliss
tour_desc_1: It's great that you can enjoy a beautiful view from your hotel window! The view of the entire city can be very impressive and captivating. You can observe the bustling city life, admire the magnificent architecture of buildings and skyscrapers, and see vast parks and greenery. Even if you're busy with work, try to take a moment and appreciate the stunning city view during your free time.
tour_desc_2: As the sun bathes the city in its warm glow, the view from the hotel window comes alive. The bustling streets, majestic skyscrapers, and lush green spaces create a captivating tapestry. Each glance reveals a new detail—a sparkling reflection, a historic silhouette—inviting appreciation. In these fleeting moments, the ever-changing panorama captivates, reminding us of the city's grandeur and beauty.
